title: Fracking Perfect!
comment: View upcoming episodes, check! View and backlog episodes, check! View a date-arranged history of queued and downloaded, wholly hell I wish Sickbeard website had that! CHECK++! And, view entire SB log, Check! Very smooth animation too. About time someone wrote a decent Android app.

title: Wow. Nice app.
comment: When I try out apps that are free and anything that's nzb related I never expect much. First impression of the app put a smile on my face it matches the desktop app perfectly. Guess who won't have to open their browser to sickbeard now. Correct anyone who installs this app. Many thanks to the Dev.!

title: slick,
comment: simple and FAST, just the way I like my apps.

title: Very well done.
comment: There isn't anything else like it.

title: Enhancements ??
comment: Congratulations on the start of a great open source app. May I suggest a couple of feature enhancements plz. It took me a while to figure out that most of the settings are mandatory. My sickbeard server is on a private network and as such I do not use username/password or API key, if I do access it from outside I use a VPN connection. But it seems that your app will not function with out them. In fact the app will crash as you leave 'settings' if they are not filled in. So can I ask that these are made 'optional'. Mind you I have set a username/password and API key so that I can use your app because I do see its value. Cheers  Mike

title: Perfect.

title: Great

title: Exactly what I was looking for

title: Great stuff

App is a bit slow when first receiving sickbeard data, though that might be a sickbeard issue on openelec and not necesssarily related to sickstache

title: Great Looking, Great Working, Great Support

The Dev was super responsive and did a great job of getting me through m y setting issues in SB and up and running.   Fantastic support!  Now that I'm in full swing, I can see that his app is well worth the dough! Great looking holo-themed (does green count?) interface with great options.

title: Banner Art
comment: Functionality is 100% spot on.  Works great.  However only 4 out of 5 stars due to the fact that only two of my shows actually display a banner.  Not sure where it fetches the banners from, whether there is a problem with that site, or a problem with the Nexus 7 or Jelly Bean.  Five stars when this is fixed.
